""" UDF cz_sas_br_sepa """

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import StringType


# pylint: disable=unused-argument
@udf(returnType=StringType())
def cz_sas_br_sepa(bic, iban, bban):
    if iban is None:
        return bban

    return (
        (
            iban[0:4]
            + " "
            + iban[4:8]
            + " "
            + iban[8:12]
            + " "
            + iban[12:16]
            + " "
            + iban[16:20]
            + " "
            + iban[20:24]
            + " "
            + iban[24:28]
            + " "
            + iban[28:32]
            + " "
            + iban[32:36]
        )
        .upper()
        .strip()
    )
